summary: A pharmacy-robbing dope fiend and his crew pop pills and evade the law.
cast: Matt Dillon|Kelly Lynch|James Le Gros|Heather Graham|Eric Hull|Max Perlich|James Remar|John Kelly|Grace Zabriskie|George Catalano|Janet Baumhover|Ted D'Arms|Neal Thomas|Stephen Rutledge|Beah Richards|William S. Burroughs|Robert Lee Pitchlynn|Roger Hancock|Michael Parker|Ray Monge|Woody|Doug Cooeyate|Wade Evans|Tom Peterson
director: Director: Gus Van Sant (as Gus Van Sant Jr.)
title: Drugstore Cowboy
